20110127040628.000|20110127040629.000|CC1|JOBS WAS SOMETHING THEY COULD

20110127040648.000|20110127040654.000|CC1|WITH THE GOP.

20110127040701.000|20110127040702.000|CC1|ROOM?

20110127040705.000|20110127040706.000|CC1|THERE?                          
20110127040706.000|20110127040708.000|CC1|>> WELL, THE FIRST QUESTION WAS 
20110127040708.000|20110127040710.000|CC1|FROM BILL SHARE AND HE BASICALLY
20110127040710.000|20110127040712.000|CC1|THANKED DAVID AXELROD FOR

20110127040714.000|20110127040715.000|CC1|PRESIDENT DID NOT PUT SOCIAL

20110127040716.000|20110127040718.000|CC1|THEY WERE HAPPY WITH THE FACT   
20110127040718.000|20110127040719.000|CC1|THAT SOCIAL SECURITY WAS        
20110127040719.000|20110127040721.000|CC1|SOMETHING PRESIDENT OBAMA SAID  
20110127040721.000|20110127040722.000|CC1|HE WOULD STRENGTHEN, NOT        
20110127040722.000|20110127040723.000|CC1|UNDERMINE.                      
20110127040723.000|20110127040724.000|CC1|THAT WAS ONE OF THE MAJOR       
20110127040724.000|20110127040726.000|CC1|WORRIES GOING INTO THE SPEECH.  
20110127040726.000|20110127040729.000|CC1|QUITE FRANKLY, THE EXPECTATIONS 
20110127040729.000|20110127040731.000|CC1|FROM THE COMMUNITY WAS          
20110127040731.000|20110127040732.000|CC1|RELATIVELY LOW GOING INTO       
20110127040732.000|20110127040733.000|CC1|OBAMA'S SPEECH.                 
20110127040733.000|20110127040734.000|CC1|SO WHEN HE TALKED ABOUT THESE   
20110127040734.000|20110127040736.000|CC1|INVESTMENTS, WHEN HE TALKED     
20110127040736.000|20110127040737.000|CC1|ABOUT SPENDING MONEY TO CREATE  
20110127040737.000|20110127040739.000|CC1|MORE JOBS, WHEN HE TALKED ABOUT 
20110127040739.000|20110127040741.000|CC1|FIRMING UP SOCIAL SECURITY AND  
20110127040741.000|20110127040743.000|CC1|RESISTING THE MOST DRACONIAN    
20110127040743.000|20110127040744.000|CC1|CUTS, THOSE ARE THINGS THAT WENT
20110127040744.000|20110127040745.000|CC1|OVER WELL WITH THE PEOPLE IN    
20110127040745.000|20110127040748.000|CC1|THIS ROOM TODAY.
